titleStmt.title: The moderate cavalier, or, The soldiers description of Ireland and of the country disease, with receipts for the same
titleStmt.author: Mercer, William, 1605?-1676?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Mercer. Cf. DNB.
Probable place of publication from Wing.
"A book fit for all Protestants in Ireland."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
